title: REVERT AND /OR NERF MORD IMMEDIATELY TOO BROKEN
body:
MORD IS TOO BROKEN A ULT LIKE THAT IS NOT SOMETHING THAT IS GOOD FOR THIS GAME IT MAKE MORD COMPLETELY UNKILLABLE AND HE JUST WALKS THROUGH YOU'RE TEAM AFTER FIRST ULT KILL SWEAR YOU DON'T EVEN HAVE TO BE GOOD AT THE GAME JUST PRESS R AND ROLL FACE ON KEYBOARD SO REVERT HIM AND/ORNERF HIM INTO USELESSNESS. 

ALSO DON'T REWORK VOLI AND FIDS THERE FINE JUST THE WAY THEY ARE.

replies.body: Buy qss/zonyas and get good? He has so many weaknesses its laughable
Get Qss and grevious wounds against him, once he uses he E just kite him. Banshees veil also works against morde too
